CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Workmanship__c)='Perfect', 5, IF(TEXT(Workmanship__c)='Good',2, IF(TEXT(Workmanship__c)='Acceptable',0, IF(TEXT(Workmanship__c)='Not acceptable',-2, IF(TEXT(Workmanship__c)='Urgent issue',-5,0))))) + IF(TEXT(Decision_Making__c)='Perfect', 5, IF(TEXT(Decision_Making__c)='Good',2, IF(TEXT(Decision_Making__c)='Acceptable',0, IF(TEXT(Decision_Making__c)='Not acceptable',-2, IF(TEXT(Decision_Making__c)='Urgent issue',-5,0))))) + IF(TEXT(Communication__c)='Perfect', 5, IF(TEXT(Communication__c)='Good',2, IF(TEXT(Tooling__c)='Good',2, IF(TEXT(Tooling__c)='Acceptable',0, IF(TEXT(Tooling__c)='Not acceptable',-2, IF(TEXT(Tooling__c)='Urgent issue',-5,0))))) + IF(TEXT(Vehicle__c)='Perfect', 5, IF(TEXT(Technical_Knowledge__c)='Good',2, IF(TEXT(Technical_Knowledge__c)='Acceptable',0, IF(TEXT(Technical_Knowledge__c)='Not acceptable',-2, IF(TEXT(Technical_Knowledge__c)='Urgent issue',-5,0))))) + IF(TEXT(Use_Of_App_Forms__c)='Perfect', 5, IF(TEXT(Use_Of_App_Forms__c)='Good',2, IF(TEXT(Use_Of_App_Forms__c)='Acceptable',0, IF(TEXT(Use_Of_App_Forms__c)='Not acceptable',-2, IF(TEXT(Use_Of_App_Forms__c)='Urgent issue',-5,0))))) + IF(TEXT(Sales_Approach__c)='Perfect', 5, IF(TEXT(Sales_Approach__c)='Good',2, IF(TEXT(Sales_Approach__c)='Acceptable',0, IF(TEXT(Sales_Approach__c)='Not acceptable',-2, IF(TEXT(Sales_Approach__c)='Urgent issue',-5,0))))) + IF(TEXT(Attitude__c)='Perfect', 5, IF(TEXT(Attitude__c)='Good',2,
